events.name: LIB supply chain sustainability
events.wd_description: The sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain (LIBSC) is critical for the decarbonization of the transportation sector, but there is limited transparency and a lack of comprehensive assessment frameworks.
events.description: The sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain (LIBSC) is critical for the decarbonization of the transportation sector, but there is limited transparency and a lack of comprehensive assessment frameworks.

events.name: Sustainability aspects
events.wd_description: 29 aspects concerning the sustainability of the LIBSC are derived and prioritized based on their importance and ease of implementation, focusing on environmental, social, governance, and economic dimensions.
events.description: 29 aspects concerning the sustainability of the LIBSC are derived and prioritized based on their importance and ease of implementation, focusing on environmental, social, governance, and economic dimensions.

events.name: GHG emissions
events.wd_description: Greenhouse gas emissions are a critical aspect of evaluating the sustainability of the LIBSC, with efforts to reduce emissions throughout the supply chain.
events.description: Greenhouse gas emissions are a critical aspect of evaluating the sustainability of the LIBSC, with efforts to reduce emissions throughout the supply chain.

events.name: Circularity indicators
events.wd_description: Circularity indicators measure the extent to which materials and resources are reused and recycled within the LIBSC.
events.description: Circularity indicators measure the extent to which materials and resources are reused and recycled within the LIBSC.

events.name: Human rights and safety issues
events.wd_description: Human rights and safety issues are crucial in assessing the sustainability of the LIBSC, focusing on ethical labor practices and safe working conditions.
events.description: Human rights and safety issues are crucial in assessing the sustainability of the LIBSC, focusing on ethical labor practices and safe working conditions.

events.name: Economic aspects
events.wd_description: Economic aspects, although considered less critical, still play a role in evaluating the sustainability of the LIBSC.
events.description: Economic aspects, although considered less critical, still play a role in evaluating the sustainability of the LIBSC.

events.name: Barriers to transparency
events.wd_description: 30 barriers to establishing the required transparency in the LIBSC are identified, stemming from the interactions and relationships among supply chain tiers.
events.description: 30 barriers to establishing the required transparency in the LIBSC are identified, stemming from the interactions and relationships among supply chain tiers.

events.name: Cross-tier assessments
events.wd_description: Effective sustainability assessments require cross-tier evaluations and collaborations among different levels of the supply chain.
events.description: Effective sustainability assessments require cross-tier evaluations and collaborations among different levels of the supply chain.

events.name: Information sharing barriers
events.wd_description: Barriers to information sharing are significant obstacles to achieving transparency and sustainability in the LIBSC.
events.description: Barriers to information sharing are significant obstacles to achieving transparency and sustainability in the LIBSC.

events.name: Stakeholder collaborations
events.wd_description: Meaningful sustainability assessments can only be achieved through significant collaborations among the stakeholders of the rapidly evolving LIBSC.
events.description: Meaningful sustainability assessments can only be achieved through significant collaborations among the stakeholders of the rapidly evolving LIBSC.

events.name: Industry stakeholders
events.wd_description: Industry stakeholders are key players in the effort to enhance the sustainability of the LIBSC.
events.description: Industry stakeholders are key players in the effort to enhance the sustainability of the LIBSC.

events.name: Policy-makers
events.wd_description: Policy-makers are crucial in establishing regulatory frameworks and guidelines to promote sustainability in the LIBSC.
events.description: Policy-makers are crucial in establishing regulatory frameworks and guidelines to promote sustainability in the LIBSC.

events.name: Collaborative efforts
events.wd_description: Collaborative efforts among various stakeholders are essential for the sustainable development of the LIBSC.
events.description: Collaborative efforts among various stakeholders are essential for the sustainable development of the LIBSC.

events.name: Regulatory frameworks
events.wd_description: Regulatory frameworks, such as those established by the European Commission, play a significant role in defining and promoting battery sustainability.
events.description: Regulatory frameworks, such as those established by the European Commission, play a significant role in defining and promoting battery sustainability.

events.name: European Commission framework
events.wd_description: The European Commission has established a regulatory framework on battery sustainability, highlighting the importance of this issue.
events.description: The European Commission has established a regulatory framework on battery sustainability, highlighting the importance of this issue.

events.name: Existing sustainability standards
events.wd_description: Leveraging and evaluating compliance with existing sustainability standards is a feasible approach to addressing the variability and complexity of sustainability aspects in the LIBSC.
events.description: Leveraging and evaluating compliance with existing sustainability standards is a feasible approach to addressing the variability and complexity of sustainability aspects in the LIBSC.
